title: My Daily Routine
prompt: Speak about the things you do every day from morning to night. Mention your habits, work, meals, and relaxation time.

title: My Favorite Food
prompt: Describe a food you like the most. Mention its taste, ingredients, and why you like it.

title: A Special Day in My Life
prompt: Describe one of a special day in your life. Include activities and experiences on that day.

title: My Best Friend
prompt: Speak about your best friend, their name, appearance, qualities, and why you like them.

title: My Hobby
prompt: Describe your favorite activity that you enjoy doing in your free time.

title: My Favorite Festival
prompt: Speak about a festival you celebrate and why it is special for you.

title: A Memorable Childhood Memory
prompt: Speak about a special moment from your childhood that you still remember.

title: My Favorite Season
prompt: Describe the season you like the most and why.

title: My Dream Job
prompt: Speak about the job you want in the future and why it interests you.

title: A Place I Want to Visit
prompt: Speak about a place you want to travel to and why.

title: My Family
prompt: Speak about your family members and their roles.

title: A Special Day with My Parents
prompt: Describe a memorable day you spent with your parents.

title: The Person I Admire the Most
prompt: Speak about someone who inspires you.

title: My Role Model
prompt: Describe someone you look up to and want to be like.

title: A Fun Day with My Siblings
prompt: Speak about an enjoyable day spent with your brother or sister.

title: How I Help My Family at Home
prompt: Describe how you assist your family with daily chores.

title: My Grandparents’ Stories
prompt: Speak about a story your grandparents told you.

title: My Favorite Family Tradition
prompt: Describe a tradition in your family and why you love it.

title: My School Days
prompt: Speak about your school memories, teachers, and friends.

title: The Best Teacher I Ever Had
prompt: Speak about a teacher who inspired you the most.
